languages.text: Схизма Прерывания Цикла была избыта. Покаяние Паскаля Ханейманна поставило точку в дискуссии о необходимости обновления алгоритмов и процедур служения, а секрет Эсхатоса был признан кощунством против Деус Механикус и забыт. Флот Осознание вновь стал един, и в единстве своем он готов был встретить упадок и деградацию Знанию, предсказанные архимагосом Амарнатом.

The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle was over. The repentance of Pasqal Haneumann put a stop to the discussion about whether to update the algorithms and procedures of worship. The secret of Eschatos was declared heresy against the Deus Mechanicus and forgotten. The Cognisance Fleet was reunited and ready to meet the decay and degradation of Knowledge prophesied by Archmagos Amarnat.
languages.original_text: Схизма Прерывания Цикла была избыта. Покаяние Паскаля Ханейманна поставило точку в дискуссии о необходимости обновления алгоритмов и процедур служения, а секрет Эсхатоса был признан кощунством против Деус Механикус и забыт. Флот Осознание вновь стал един, и в единстве своем он готов был встретить упадок и деградацию Знанию, предсказанные архимагосом Амарнатом.

traits.locale_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle was over. The repentance of Pasqal Haneumann put a stop to the discussion about the need to update algorithms and procedures of worship. Eschatos's secret was declared blasphemy against the Deus Mechanicus and forgotten. Cognisance Fleet became united once again, and in its unity, it was ready to meet the decay and degradation of Knowledge, prophesied by archmagos Amarnat.

languages.text: 终止循环所造成的分裂结束了。帕斯卡·哈努曼进行了忏悔，礼拜算法与程序更新的相关讨论也戛然而止。终焉审判的秘密被定性为背离万机之神的异端产物，最终被所有人遗忘。真理开拓者舰队再次团结起来，准备面对阿玛纳特大贤者曾预言的知识大衰退。
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle was over. The repentance of Pasqal Haneumann put a stop to the discussion about whether to update the algorithms and procedures of worship. The secret of Eschatos was declared heresy against the Deus Mechanicus and forgotten. The Cognisance Fleet was reunited and ready to meet the decay and degradation of Knowledge prophesied by Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: 终止循环所造成的分裂结束了。帕斯卡·哈努曼进行了忏悔，礼拜算法与程序更新的相关讨论也戛然而止。终焉审判的秘密被定性为背离万机之神的异端产物，最终被所有人遗忘。真理开拓者舰队再次团结起来，准备面对阿玛纳特大贤者曾预言的知识大衰退。

languages.text: Das Schisma der Unterbrechung des Zyklus war beendet. Pasqal Haneumanns Reue setzte der Diskussion ein Ende, ob man die Algorithmen und Prozeduren der Anbetung aktualisieren muss. Eschatos' Geheimnis wurde zur Ketzerei gegen den Deus Mechanicus erklärt und vergessen. Die Erkenntnisflotte wurde wiedervereint und war bereit, dem Verfall und der Degeneration des Wissens entgegenzutreten, die von Erzmagos Amarnat vorhergesagt worden waren.
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle was over. The repentance of Pasqal Haneumann put a stop to the discussion about whether to update the algorithms and procedures of worship. The secret of Eschatos was declared heresy against the Deus Mechanicus and forgotten. The Cognisance Fleet was reunited and ready to meet the decay and degradation of Knowledge prophesied by Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: Das Schisma der Unterbrechung des Zyklus war beendet. Pasqal Haneumanns Reue setzte der Diskussion ein Ende, ob man die Algorithmen und Prozeduren der Anbetung aktualisieren muss. Eschatos' Geheimnis wurde zur Ketzerei gegen den Deus Mechanicus erklärt und vergessen. Die Erkenntnisflotte wurde wiedervereint und war bereit, dem Verfall und der Degeneration des Wissens entgegenzutreten, die von Erzmagos Amarnat vorhergesagt worden waren.

languages.text: Le schisme de l'Interruption du Cycle était terminé. Le repentir de Pasqal Haneumann mit un terme aux débats sur la mise à jour des algorithmes et des procédures de vénération. Le secret d'Eschatos fut qualifié d'hérésie à l'encontre du Deus Mechanicus et tomba dans l'oubli. La Flotte de la Connaissance à nouveau unie était prête à faire face au déclin et à la dégradation du savoir prophétisés par l'archimagos Amarnat.
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle was over. The repentance of Pasqal Haneumann put a stop to the discussion about whether to update the algorithms and procedures of worship. The secret of Eschatos was declared heresy against the Deus Mechanicus and forgotten. The Cognisance Fleet was reunited and ready to meet the decay and degradation of Knowledge prophesied by Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: Le schisme de l'Interruption du Cycle était terminé. Le repentir de Pasqal Haneumann mit un terme aux débats sur la mise à jour des algorithmes et des procédures de vénération. Le secret d'Eschatos fut qualifié d'hérésie à l’encontre du Deus Mechanicus et tomba dans l'oubli. La Flotte de la Connaissance à nouveau unie était prête à faire face au déclin et à la dégradation du savoir prophétisés par l'archimagos Amarnat.

languages.text: El cisma de la Discontinuación del Ciclo llegó a su fin. El arrepentimiento de Pasqal Haneumann acabó con el debate sobre la actualización de los algoritmos y procedimientos de adoración. El secreto de Eschatos se declaró herejía contra el Mechanicus y fue relegado al olvido. La Flota Conciencia estaba reunida y lista para hacer frente al declive y la degradación del conocimiento profetizado por el Archimagos Amarnat.
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle was over. The repentance of Pasqal Haneumann put a stop to the discussion about whether to update the algorithms and procedures of worship. The secret of Eschatos was declared heresy against the Deus Mechanicus and forgotten. The Cognisance Fleet was reunited and ready to meet the decay and degradation of Knowledge prophesied by Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: El cisma de la Discontinuación del Ciclo llegó a su fin. El arrepentimiento de Pasqal Haneumann acabó con el debate sobre la actualización de los algoritmos y procedimientos de adoración. El secreto de Eschatos se declaró herejía contra el Mechanicus y fue relegado al olvido. La Flota Conciencia estaba reunida y lista para hacer frente al declive y la degradación del conocimiento profetizado por el Archimagos Amarnat.

languages.text: 「サイクルを断ち切る」ことによる分裂は終わりを迎えた。パスカル・ヘニュマンの悔い改めにより、礼拝のアルゴリズムと手順を更新するかどうかの議論は終息した。エスカトの秘密はデウス・メカニクスに対する異端であると宣言され、忘れ去られた。コグニサンス艦隊は再結成され、大賢人アマルナトが予言した知識の衰退と劣化に立ち向かう準備が整った。
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle was over. The repentance of Pasqal Haneumann put a stop to the discussion about whether to update the algorithms and procedures of worship. The secret of Eschatos was declared heresy against the Deus Mechanicus and forgotten. The Cognisance Fleet was reunited and ready to meet the decay and degradation of Knowledge prophesied by Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: 「サイクルを断ち切る」ことによる分裂は終わりを迎えた。パスカル・ヘニュマンの悔い改めにより、礼拝のアルゴリズムと手順を更新するかどうかの議論は終息した。エスカトの秘密はデウス・メカニクスに対する異端であると宣言され、忘れ去られた。コグニサンス艦隊は再結成され、大賢人アマルナトが予言した知識の衰退と劣化に立ち向かう準備が整った。

languages.text: Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu anlayışı son buldu. Pasqal Haneumann'ın tövbe edişi, tapınma algoritmalarını ve prosedürlerini güncellemenin gerekip gerekmediği hususundaki tartışmalara son verdi. Eskatos'un sırrı, Deus Mechanicus'a karşı kâfirlik olarak ilan edilip unutuldu. Malumat Filosu toplandı ve Başmagos Amarnat'ın öngördüğü İrfan çöküşüne ve bozulumuna karşı hazırlıklara başladı.
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle was over. The repentance of Pasqal Haneumann put a stop to the discussion about whether to update the algorithms and procedures of worship. The secret of Eschatos was declared heresy against the Deus Mechanicus and forgotten. The Cognisance Fleet was reunited and ready to meet the decay and degradation of Knowledge prophesied by Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: Döngü'nün Süreğini Bozma anlayışı son buldu. Pasqal Haneumann'ın tövbe edişi, tapınma algoritmalarını ve prosedürlerini güncellemenin gerekip gerekmemesi hakkındaki tartışmalara bir son verdi. Eschatos'un sırrı, Deus Mechanicus'a karşı bir kâfirlik olarak ilan edildi ve unutuldu. Malumat Filosu bir araya geldi ve Başmagos Amarnat'ın öngördüğü İrfan çöküşüne ve bozulmasına karşı koymak için kendini hazırladı.
